## TransformOptions.preference property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Preference for handling ambiguous transformation cases: - `'readable'`<!-- -->: Prefer more human-readable output - `'precise'`<!-- -->: Prefer more precise/detailed output - `'compact'`<!-- -->: Prefer shorter output

**Signature:**

```typescript
preference?: 'readable' | 'precise' | 'compact';
```
